content.title: Intro
content.content: -lto is a pronominal Quenya suffix meaning "they", occurring in Fíriel's Song (meldielto "they are beloved" and cárielto "they made").[source?] Also, tulielto "they have come".[1]

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, Christopher Tolkien (ed.), The Book of Lost Tales Part One, "V. The Coming of the Elves and the Making of Kôr", p. 114
